identity: Unknown to the general populace of Earth
however he is known publicly on Asgard.
powers: As an Asgardian Hogun possesses superhuman strength, and enhanced durability and endurance.
significantissues: Hogun was among the Asgardians that left Asgard, in search of the missing Odin (Thor #255-263,1977)
his soul found by Thor after Ragnarok and brought back alive (Thor #4, 2007)
